data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Elfsborg drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 3, Elfsborg have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for Mjallby at Borås Arena.
Mjallby awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 5, Can Elfsborg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Mjallby's half?
Elfsborg push upfield but Granit Maqedonci quickly pulls them for offside.
Can Mjallby capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Elfsborg's half?
In the minute 6, Mjallby's Kadir Hodzic breaks free at Borås Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Elfsborg goal kick.
Mjallby awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 8, Own goal in Boras! Gustav Henriksson scores in his own net to make it 0-1.
Ball safe as Mjallby is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Mjallby in their own half.
In the minute 11, Granit Maqedonci awards the away team a throw-in.
Johan Larsson gets an equalizer for Elfsborg. The score is now 1-1.
That's a fine assist from Simon Olsson.
In the minute 13, Elfsborg advance rapidly upfield but Granit Maqedonci blows for offside.
Throw-in Elfsborg.
In Boras, Samuel Holmen of Elfsborg is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 14, Elfsborg's Samuel Holmen is on target but unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Elfsborg.
Karlsson for Elfsborg gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 16, Goal kick for Mjallby at Borås Arena.
Granit Maqedonci blows against Elfsborg's Karlsson for offside.
Granit Maqedonci signals a throw-in for Elfsborg, close to Mjallby's area.
In the minute 19, Karlsson (Elfsborg) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Elfsborg have been awarded a corner by Granit Maqedonci.
Granit Maqedonci awards Mjallby a goal kick.
In the minute 20, Granit Maqedonci signals a free kick to Mjallby.
Granit Maqedonci signals a free kick to Mjallby in their own half.
Corner awarded to Elfsborg.
In the minute 24, Free kick for Mjallby in the half of Elfsborg.
Karlsson (Elfsborg) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Throw-in for Elfsborg close to the penalty box.
In the minute 25, Throw-in for Mjallby in the half of Elfsborg.
Throw-in high up the field for Mjallby in Boras.
In Boras a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 30, Elfsborg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Elfsborg have been awarded a corner by Granit Maqedonci.
Mjallby needs to be cautious. Elfsborg have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 32, Throw-in for Elfsborg in their own half.
Granit Maqedonci signals a Mjallby throw-in in Elfsborg's half.
Elfsborg are pushing forward but Karlsson's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 34, Mjallby have a goal kick.
Free kick Mjallby.
In Boras Mjallby attack through Kadir Hodzic. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 36, It's a goal kick for the home team in Boras.
Elfsborg have been awarded a corner by Granit Maqedonci.
Karlsson of Elfsborg gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 37, Ball goes out of play for a Mjallby goal kick.
At Borås Arena, Elfsborg are penalized for being offside.
Granit Maqedonci awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 41, Mjallby to take a throw-in in Elfsborg territory.
Throw-in Elfsborg.
Elfsborg are whistled for offside.
In the minute 42, Mjallby's Moses Ogbu misses with an attempt on goal.
Granit Maqedonci awards Elfsborg a goal kick.
Granit Maqedonci signals a throw-in for Elfsborg, close to Mjallby's area.
In the minute 43, Elfsborg are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Throw-in for Elfsborg in their own half.
Free kick for Mjallby in their own half.
In the minute 45, Ball safe as Elfsborg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Granit Maqedonci will wait an extra 2 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
Granit Maqedonci signals a free kick to Mjallby in their own half.
In the minute 45, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Mjallby at Borås Arena.
The first-half has come to a close in Boras.
In the minute 46, The second-half has started.
Granit Maqedonci signals a free kick to Mjallby in their own half.
In the minute 46, Granit Maqedonci signals a Mjallby throw-in in Elfsborg's half.
Eric Bjorkander is on a sub for Jesper Lofgren for Mjallby.
Free kick for Mjallby in their own half.
Goal kick for Mjallby at Borås Arena.
In the minute 50, Free kick for Mjallby in the half of Elfsborg.
Corner awarded to Mjallby.
Mjallby have a goal kick.
In the minute 52, Mjallby to take a throw-in in Elfsborg territory.
In Boras, Mjallby push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Mjallby awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 57, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Boras.
Mjallby awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 59, Elfsborg push upfield but Granit Maqedonci quickly pulls them for offside.
Can Elfsborg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Mjallby's half?
Elfsborg's Karlsson gets in a shot on goal at Borås Arena. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 62, Throw-in for Elfsborg in the half of Mjallby.
Elfsborg have been awarded a corner by Granit Maqedonci.
Elfsborg are coming forward and Joseph Okumu gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 63, Goal kick for Mjallby at Borås Arena.
Elfsborg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Elfsborg.
An attacking Elfsborg player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
In the minute 66, Max Watson is booked for the away team.
It's advantage Elfsborg in Boras as Karlsson scores from the spot to make it 2-1.
Throw-in for Elfsborg in their own half.
In the minute 68, Jeppe Okkels is replacing Samuel Holmen for Elfsborg at Borås Arena.
Elfsborg make their second substitution with Simon Strand replacing Rami Kaib.
In the minute 69, Free kick for Mjallby in their own half.
In Boras a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Mjallby's Moses Ogbu misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 71, Elfsborg have a goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Granit Maqedonci signals a free kick to Mjallby in their own half.
In the minute 73, Ball safe as Mjallby is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Elfsborg's Simon Strand gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Mjallby goal kick.
In the minute 74, At Borås Arena, Elfsborg are penalized for being offside.
Free kick Elfsborg.
At Borås Arena, Eric Bjorkander has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 78, Corner awarded to Elfsborg.
Goal! Mjallby go level at 2-2 through Besard Sabovic in Boras.
Elfsborg have been awarded a corner by Granit Maqedonci.
Granit Maqedonci signals a free kick to Mjallby.
In the minute 81, The home team replace Rasmus Alm with Jacob Ondrejka.
Mjallby surge into the attack at Borås Arena but Eric Bjorkander’s header is off-target.
In the minute 82, It's a goal kick for the home team in Boras.
Can Mjallby get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Elfsborg's half?
Mjallby have been awarded a corner by Granit Maqedonci.
In the minute 84, Granit Maqedonci signals a Mjallby throw-in in Elfsborg's half.
Mjallby to take a throw-in in Elfsborg territory.
Granit Maqedonci awards Mjallby a goal kick.
In the minute 86, Throw-in for Elfsborg in the half of Mjallby.
Free kick for Elfsborg in their own half.
Besard Sabovic (Mjallby) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 87, Granit Maqedonci awards the away team a throw-in.
Elfsborg to take a throw-in in Mjallby territory.
Corner awarded to Mjallby.
In the minute 89, Ball goes out of play for a Elfsborg goal kick.
Elfsborg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Elfsborg advance rapidly upfield but Granit Maqedonci blows for offside.
At Borås Arena the fourth official shows that 2 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Granit Maqedonci signals a free kick to Mjallby.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Mjallby close to the penalty box.
Elfsborg have a goal kick.
Granit Maqedonci blows to end the match. The final score is 2-2.
Sivert Heltne Nilsen (Elfsborg) gets booked by Granit Maqedonci, and will miss the next match due to the number of yellow cards received this season.
